title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Lakes and Ponds
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems     Lakes and Ponds                Lakes and Ponds        Hunting Creek Lake in adjacent Cunningham Falls State Park    Â     Due to the lay of the land, there are no natural lakes or ponds at Catoctin Mountain Park. Some areas adjacent to streams support small intermittent ponds, but these have a tendency to disappear during drought conditions.   Adjacent to the park is Hunting Creek Lake. Managed by  Cunningham Falls State Park, the 75 acre man-made lake is a popular place for swimming, boating, and fishing.
